Name: Via Trento
comments: nice and sweet.

Name: Via Teresa
comments: long adventure, needs good orientation. set by Furlani & Bassi, one of the first routes with climbing shoes of the area

Name: Beserlpark
notes: Plaisirclimb, very bolted. Walk passages inbetween. For Alpineinsteiger

Name: Heimaterde
notes: alpine feeling, good bolted. Watchout for exit, see description

Name: Sonnenkind
notes: climbs Baumgartnerturm, abseilen then crosses Wildenauersteig

Name: Puzzle für Fortgeschrittene
notes: hard, might take long. Not so near to Skywalker

Name: Kronjuwel
notes: very hard, might take long. all 6.grade with some 7. BUT just beneath Skywalker

Name: Appelsteig
notes: only tree belaying. There's a cave in the middle

Name: Kanzelsteig
notes: Steinschlag, Testamentwandl. Wildenauerclassic. Combine with technikersteig

Name: Turmsteig
notes: looks fun. Tower @Wildenauer ferrata. Abseilen.good bolted, combine with Baumgartnerturm. See book for variations

Name: Tirolersteig
comments: overrated,long walks in between, little climbimng

Name: Fredsteig
notes: For KK training. But prob. recently updated safety. Look for Fredi Variation

Name: Betty&Paul
comments: just great, last 2 SLmissing becuase ended up on Alter WOlf

Name: Traum&Wirklichkeit
comments: Just great, some loose rocks in first half. last SL missing bec. Fortunato tired. completed in 2024

Name: D'Habergoass
notes: great, generous bolting. See nearby routes for easier options. Eine stelle 7+(6-)

Name: Auf Wildenauer Spuren
comments: hard single moves and constant grade. great bolting. pers. grade 7-

Name: Sudkante
comments: great, scenic adventure. alpine touch

Name: Wachthüttelwandkamine
notes: best kamin of the area, alpine bolting.one giant kamin

Name: Via Helma
notes: plaisir, A0, diverse climbing, risse, wide cracks etc

Name: Wildes Gamseck
notes: nice way up the plateu. Rope ?

Name: Westweg Preinerwand
notes: looks fun. Matchable with harder routes

Name: Raxagonia
notes: see combination at obere Preinerwand. Linl with endlich Herbst

Name: Kowelkapfeiler
notes: long approach, full alpine. KK & Friends. Starts at 1500. also check bartlrisse

Name: Blechmauern Verschneidung
notes: hard classic, varied climbing. Bring KK . Def challenging

Name: Gelber Oktober
notes: constant hard, sport bolted, verz long. short zustieg. 7+

Name: Gamslgartlgrat
notes: starts at 1500, goes almost to top. Longer than BurkleSteig.both to combine with RHG-Grat

Name: Herminensteig
notes: combine with Nandlgrat. AV guy told it's hard (!?)

Name: Nandlgrat
notes: good for winter BUT avalanche danger!

Name: Bürklesteig
notes: also in winter, but attention. No stands

Name: Dir. Richterkante
comments: long, scenic adventure with long runouts on easy bits, but good bolted on hard moves

Name: Welcome to Stadliwand
notes: full 6. to 7. grade, well bolted. shrter than others. maybe good to start

Name: Durststrecke
notes: full 6. to 7. grade, well bolted. " unteren 6ten Grat bis zu 4 Meter über den letzten BH".Longest route here

Name: Des Kessels neue Kleider
notes: lighter alternative to Durststecke. Full 6. grade. also very long

Name: TBD
notes: Himmelslieter OR Sonnenplattenweg OR Joe Stickler Weg. Same length , dif grades and character

Name: Wachauergrat
notes: overall sport bolted. Shrter brother "Don Bosco" easier but to integrate with mobile

Name: Bergrettungsweg
comments: avoid 1SL , take route to the left. Rest is super nice

Name: Gosauseen Triathlon
comments: half slab, half vertical. great

Name: Schober Sudgrat
comments: nice, very glassy

Name: Draschgrat
notes: done in all version a few times. my first MP ever
comments: classic beginner material

Name: Juniperus
notes: not sure was this one. but they all are similar there

Name: Via diretta monte Pellegrino
notes: many variations, not easy to stay on the line
comments: nice

Name: Via fratelli Tit
comments: great varied climbing

Name: normale Cimone pala
notes: reaches over 3000m. the only 3. grade climbing pitch is bolted
comments: easy and scary

Name: Sonntagsspaziergang
comments: beautiful line on great rock

Name: Via lunga
Link: Pianarella - Via Lunga - Vie Lunghe Finale - Arrampicata - Climbing
comments: very nice. stopped at half to practice abseiling

Name: il canto del sifone
comments: nice

Name: thalassa
comments: beautiful middle pitch

Name: Zentennium
comments: hard crux is A0able

Name: Hoppetosse
comments: nice experience, abseiled over route. ugly climbing though

Name: Schell 8er
notes: one 7- and one 6+, both crack. mhhh rest is max 5+

Name: Dirty Flirty
comments: with benni, not nice route

Name: Herz uber Kopf
Link: "Herz über Kopf (VII-)"Sass dles Nö, Fanis, - Alpenverein Südtirol
notes: long, central part is hardisch with some 6/7 pitsches

Name: Sogni dolomitici
Link: "Sogni dolomitici (VII-)" Cima d'Ambiez, Brentagruppe - Alpenverein Südtirol
notes: all pythons, mobile protection is meant to be easy to integrate

Name: Gana tla pera
Link: "Gana tla pera (VII-)"Sass dles Nö, Fanis - Alpenverein Südtirol
notes: slabs all the way, looks beautifull

comments: as second with Zeppe. one 5+ pitch was hard. quite garden-like overall

Name: Spigolo del Vecio
comments: beautiful rock and climb, good to protect.
nice slab, but monotonous. wet was more fun

Name: No name
comments: first multipitch after a while, was scary
